boone.io

Class BooneFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • boone.io.IOFilter
      • boone.io.BooneFilter

  • public class BooneFilter
extends IOFilter
    An I/O filter for the native Boone file format with optional GZip compression. The type name describing the type of data is a bit redundant, but it is also used for a basic check, if a file contains indeed Boone data.
    Since:
    14. Sept. 2004
    Version:
    $Id: BooneFilter.java 2294 2016-04-18 11:38:16Z helmut $
    Author:
    August Mayer, Helmut A. Mayer
